result.execSummary:
The defendant Lou Chana M Meiller was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Lou Chana M Meiller is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Lou Chana M Meiller was found guilty of Theft-Movable Property <=$2500 [Modifiers: Penalty-Theft if Value <=$2500], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.20(1)(a).
  • Lou Chana M Meiller was found guilty of Theft-Movable Property <=$2500 [Modifiers: Penalty-Theft if Value <=$2500], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.20(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: If probation is revoked or will discharge with outstanding financial obligations due, a civil judgment shall be entered for the balance due.
AODA and comply if agent recommends.  Psychological evaluation if agent recommends.  Maintain absolute sobriety.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Lou Chana M Meiller

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Defendant's probation terminated on 1-26-17; unpaid supervision fees of $180

Defendant Lou Chana M Meiller in court with attorney Adam Raabe.  Crystal N Long appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Information filed adding Counts 2, & 3.  Reading waived.  Rights/Elements.  Defendant plead no contest to Cts. 2 & 3.  Court found guilty.  Judgment was entered.  Ct. 1 Dismissed.  Court sentenced defendant on Cts. 2 & 3 to serve 2 years probation each.  $443.00 costs each ct.  AODA and comply if agent recommends.  Psychological evaluation if agent recommends.  Maintain absolute sobriety.  Restitution in the probation amount of $1000.00 plus surcharge for a total of $1100.00.  2 days jail credit due.
restitution stipulation in the probation amount of $1000.00 and total of $1100.00

Defendant Lou Chana M Meiller in court with attorney Adam Raabe for Atty Holtz.  Jane E. Kohlwey appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Atty Raabe requesting plea/sentencing hearing, bond cont'd  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for January 26, 2015 at 02:45 pm.
Petition For Leave to File Additional Motions filed by Atty Genda

records.addlTxt: Unsigned Restitution Stipulation for $1100.00, being $1000 and a surcharge of $100.
from Atty Holtz requesting a reset for the 11/13/14 Return Date
with Petition For Leave to File Additional Motions filed by Atty Holtz.
No contact with K.N. or S.N.  Standard felony conditions.

Defendant Lou Chana M Meiller in court, in custody with attorney Leonie Dolch.  Troy D Cross appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  $2000.00 signature bond.  No contact with K.N. or S.N.  Standard felony conditions.  Waives time limits.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for November 3, 2014 at 01:30 pm.  Hearing scheduled for November 13, 2014 at 02:45 pm.
